@kkai26582 Pedo is someone who's sexually attracted to the real life children. Lolicon is someone who jerks off to loli hentai. Lolicon may or may not be a pedo, and pedo may or may not be a lolicon. So yes, they are different but one could be either or both. The real difference between them is that lolicon is attracted to fictional little girls and pedo is attracted to real life little girls. Being a pedophile is illegal, and  will be sent to prison to be butt-fucked and beaten to near-death, but being a lolicon is not illegal and does not harm anybody as long as you acknowledge the difference between fiction and reality.
